attributes.action: Bring back the VW singing dog advert
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: After today (6th April 2008), the best advert on TV in years is being pulled because animal rights do-gooders fear the Jack Russell has been abused. The advert has been viewed over 500,000 times on Youtube, but also resulted in over 500 complaints to the Advertising Standards Authority and an RSPCA investigation. So, the campaign starts here! Sign this petition and BRING BACK THE DOG!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
